title: I sual rit phurh tihbona i duh em?
lyrics:
I sual rit phurh tihbona i duh em?
Thisenah thiltihtheihna chu awm;
Sualna zawng zawngte hneh vek i duh em?
Thisenah theihna chu a awm.

Thiltihtheihna mak tak a awm a,
Beramno thisenah;
Thiltihtheihna mak tak a awm a,
Beramno thisen hluah chuan.

Chapo, chakna sual, hneh ve i duh em?
Thisenah thiltihtheihna a awm;
Kalvari sil faina lui pan ve teh,
Thisenah theihna chu a awm.

Vur ai pawha lo var zawk i duh em?
Thisenah thiltihtheihna a awm;
Sual silfai thei nunna tuii a ni e,
Thisenah theihna chu a awm.

Lal Isua rawngbawl ve tawh i duh em?
Thisenah thiltihtheihna chu awm;
Ni tin amah faka zai i duh em?
Thisenah theihna chu a awm.
